channel.title: Packing Cache into Client Jar?
channel.description:
Hyperion client runs but only if the cache folder in same directory as the client jar, is it possible to include the cache inside to jar instead?
I thread simply packing the jar with cache inside and it doesn't work. Then I looked for "/cache" in the client java files and deleted them and it didn't work.

item.title: Packing Cache into Client Jar?
item.dc:creator: @Invexity Invexity

Only code with “signlink” in client project.

item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

Lol deleting them would mean you won’t be able to load up cache, you can change cache file location in signlink
